title: Mini-Ep 295: Hot Chocolate Is Self-Care
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 295: Hot Chocolate Is Self-Care
description:
Kate is still on the hunt for the perfect vitamin c serum and Doree has a tale to tell about a serum spill. Then, listeners want to know what to do about nostril zits, how to relax after a surgery, and share a great pun that was missed by Kat and Dor. Plus, another young listener proves that self-care habits can start at any age. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
